item.description:
Rotaractors,

In lieu of our standard first Thursday meeting, let's go out for Shabu. We can have an "informal meeting" to discuss the upcoming Ipswitch Interact - Boston collaboration/scavenger hunt/volunteer day.  I'll also invite the Cambridge and BU Rotaract clubs.

The buffet costs about 16.00 a person but it's worth it.  All members, inductees and guests are welcome to attend.   Contact me or President Clarke for any other information.

http://www.yelp.com/biz/hot-pot-buffet-boston
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet outside - near the Chinatown gate at 12:00

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Shabu Lunch
